caption.p: Impact of different concentrations (0.25, 0.5, and 0.75 mg/cm 2) from O. basilicum EOs on repellent % of S. oryzae adults at 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 h exposure times (mean Â± SD) compared with standard chemical pesticide (4 ppm malathion). Different letters indicate significant differences between different treatments at p < 0.05; LSD = 0.157.
